document.full_text: american sam querrey made smooth progress into the second round of the queen's club grasscourt championships on monday as he began the defense of his title with a 6-3 6-4 victory over japan's kei nishikori.
document.title: holder querrey makes smooth start at queen's
lines_and_colors: american sam querrey made smooth progress into the second round of the queen's club grasscourt championships on monday as he began the defense of his title with a 6-3 6-4 victory over japan's kei nishikori.
